name: World of Talecraft
description:
Complete quests in Boerum Country as Karrion, and earn gold. Engage in illegal business, and innocence. When you get lost in this country, you find a secret criminal organization, and you decide to work for them, but things go wrong. World of Talecraft contains a huge map, where you can complete quests for people, fight monsters and interact with people.

-----------------------------------------------------

This is a sequel to the original Talecraft, although, it has no connection to it.
